comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: William DeWolf Hopper (March 30, 1858 – September 23, 1935) was an American actor, singer, comedian, and theatrical producer. Although a star of the musical stage, he was best-known for performing the popular baseball poem Casey at the Bat. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/DeWolf_Hopper

comment._content: does anyone know of any programs which can hep you change modern digital photos into old photos like this one? thanks

comment.author: 63860770@N07
comment._content: Thanks Richard Arthur Norton, We'll add Mr. Hopper's full name to the record. We will also spell out George Mooser's name. For those interested, he was a producer and director of plays and musicals. His name comes up fairly often in newspaper of the early 20th century.
